extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Latest Software Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the latest version of the software to mitigate vulnerabilities. Discontinue the use of older software versions.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that all control system devices and/or systems are not accessible from the Internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control Systems Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Place control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs. Ensure VPNs are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Clicking Unsolicited Links
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages to protect against social engineering attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Educate on Social Engineering and Phishing
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.

cve_id: Keysight Ixia Vision Product Family Vulnerability
